t: Gorham Manufacturing Company - Wikipedia
s: April 14, 2025 - The Gorham Manufacturing Company was one of the largest American manufacturers of sterling and silverplate and a foundry for bronze sculpture. Gorham Silver was founded in 1831 in Providence, Rhode Island by Jabez Gorham, a master craftsman, in partnership with Henry L. Webster.

t: Sterling Collectables: Gorham Sterling Flatware
